histogram.name: CPU.Experimental.CpuEstimationTaskMigrated
histogram.summary:
True if the CPU estimation task was running on a different CPU at the end of the assembly loop than it was at the beginning.
Recorded when the CPU estimation task runs (every 5 minutes). Windows x86 only.

histogram.name: CPU.Experimental.CpuEstimationTaskQueuedTime.{CoreType}
histogram.summary:
The time in microseconds during which the CPU estimation task was queued before running.
Recorded when the CPU estimation task runs (every 5 minutes). Windows x86 only. Reported only on devices using the high resolution clock.

histogram.name: CPU.Experimental.CpuEstimationTaskThreadTime.{CoreType}
histogram.summary:
The thread time in microseconds it took to fully execute the CPU estimation task.
Recorded when the CPU estimation task runs (every 5 minutes). Windows x86 only. Reported only on devices using the high resolution clock.

histogram.name: CPU.Experimental.CpuEstimationTaskTotalTime.{CoreType}
histogram.summary:
The time in microseconds it took to fully execute the CPU estimation task, that is its queued time + the wall time elapsed before the task finished.
Recorded when the CPU estimation task runs (every 5 minutes). Windows x86 only. Reported only on devices using the high resolution clock.

histogram.name: CPU.Experimental.CpuEstimationTaskWallTime.{CoreType}
histogram.summary:
The wall time in microseconds it took to fully execute the CPU estimation task.
Recorded when the CPU estimation task runs (every 5 minutes). Windows x86 only. Reported only on devices using the high resolution clock.

histogram.name: CPU.Experimental.CpuEstimationThreadTimePercent.{CoreType}
histogram.summary:
The ratio of thread time vs wall time of the CPU estimation task's "running" portion, i.e. the thread time of the assembly loop divided by its wall time.
Recorded when the CPU estimation task runs (every 5 minutes). Windows x86 only.

histogram.name: CPU.Experimental.EstimatedFrequencyAsPercentOfLimit.{CoreType}
histogram.summary:
The CPU frequency as a percentage of the estimated current frequency (see base::EstimateCpuFrequency) over the max frequency of the fastest CPU, as reported by base::GetCpuMhzLimit.
Recorded when the CPU estimation task runs (every 5 minutes). Windows x86 only.

histogram.name: CPU.Experimental.EstimatedFrequencyAsPercentOfMax.{CoreType}
histogram.summary:
The CPU frequency as a percentage of the estimated current frequency (see base::EstimateCpuFrequency) over the max frequency of the fastest CPU, as reported by base::GetCpuMaxMhz.
Recorded when the CPU estimation task runs (every 5 minutes). Windows x86 only.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.CPUMonitorMemoryUse.{ResourceContextType}.{ResourceContextState}
histogram.summary: The estimated size of CPUMeasurementMonitor's result cache. Recorded at the same time as the Memory.Browser.PrivateMemoryFootprint. This slice is the memory used to store {ResourceContextType} that are {ResourceContextState}.

variant.name: Dead
variant.summary: associated with a resource that no longer exists

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.DiskStats.UserDataDirFreeSpaceMb
histogram.summary: The amount of available space in megabytes on the disk that hosts the current user data directory as reported by SysInfo::AmountOfFreeDiskSpace(user_data_dir). Warning: this histogram was expired from 2025-02-16 to 2025-03-20; data may be missing.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.DiskStats.UserDataDirFreeSpacePercent
histogram.summary: The percentage of available space on the disk that hosts the current user data directory as reported by SysInfo::AmountOfFreeDiskSpace(user_data_dir) / capacity.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.Experimental.AccessibilityModeFlag
histogram.summary: Whether individual accessibility mode flags are set. Recorded with every UMA report to attempt to slice other metrics based on which a11y flags are set.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.Experimental.HasAccessibilityModeFlag
histogram.summary: Whether any accessibility mode flags are set. Recorded with every UMA report to attempt to slice other metrics based on whether a11y is active.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.InputScenarioChanges{InputScenario}
histogram.summary: Logged whenever the Performance Manager input scenario changes away from {InputScenario}, with the reason for the change.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.RegistryStats.FrontEndHeapDebugOptionsOutcome
histogram.summary: The outcome of attempting to read the value of the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE : Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Image File : FrontEndHeapDebugOptions registry key. Emitted when UMA requests information about the current session (see metrics::MetricsProvider::ProvideCurrentSessionData).

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.RegistryStats.FrontEndHeapDebugOptionsValue
histogram.summary: The value of the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE : Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Image File : FrontEndHeapDebugOptions registry key. Emitted every time kSuccess is reported to PerformanceManager.RegistryStats.FrontEndHeapDebugOptionsOutcome.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.TabRevisitTracker.TimeToClose2
histogram.summary: Logged everytime a background tab is closed. Records the time in seconds that the tab has spent in the background since it was last active.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.TabRevisitTracker.TimeToRevisit2
histogram.summary: Logged everytime a background tab is revisited. Records the time in seconds that the tab has spent in the background since it was last active.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.UserTuning.BatterySaverModeEnabledPercent
histogram.summary: Recorded every UMA upload, this histogram represents the percentage of the interval since the last upload that was spent with Battery Saver enabled.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.UserTuning.EfficiencyMode
histogram.summary:
Logged on each UMA upload to represent which user-controllable Efficiency Mode setting the browser is in during the reported window. If the mode was changed between uploads, MIXED will be reported for that interval.
This histogram is used internally to filter other histograms by efficiency mode.

histogram.name: PerformanceManager.UserTuning.MemorySaverModeEnabledPercent
histogram.summary: Recorded every UMA upload, this histogram represents the percentage of the interval since the last upload that was spent with Memory Saver enabled.
